content:
At lunch in McKinley I'll have a table to discuss issues of patient advocacy, patient input to FHIR, and all such things. @Grahame Grieve will join.

I'll try to find an empty table along the far wall, as close to the front as possible.

We’re all patients! And FHIR matters for us. See Dave’s write up of DevDays: https://tincture.io/3163afa94409. If you want to advocate for outcomes for patients, irrespective of your days job (or if that is your day job!), come join us for lunch
